ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Zardus chuckles at Nemesis comment, taking out a launcher and firing at the ship. DeathStorm lands behind some rocks, watching the scene for now.

::Zardus/DeathStorm/Killer/Annihilator/Prowl/Mosquitor::

Zardus chuckles at Nemesis' comment, taking out a launcher and firing at the 
ship.

DeathStorm lands behind some rocks, watching the scene for now.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Killer growls as the shots from Jackle hit him in the stomach. Regaining his 
balance, he nods at Set's orders and starts dragging Hell Beast and Jackle to 
the holding cells.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Annihilator is nearly thrown off his feet as Zardus' and Nemesis' shots hit 
the ship.

"Slag!" He says to himself and rolls out of the ship and behind a crumpled 
metal sheet, firing off a shot at the boulder which Zardus is behind.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl nods. "Designated flies my foot." He grunts. Seeing the ship off in the 
distance, he decides it is a good time to land and swoops down low, opening 
his talons and dropping Iron Raptor safely to the ground before coming to a 
painfull stop against a tree.

He get up, rubbing his head. "Go on a diet," he advises Iron Raptor.

His face gets serious. "Ok, let's go check out the ship."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Mosquitor hears Phoenix's transmission. The leadership was captured!! He 
growls, flying off toward the new predacon ship. He would get the leadership 
back!!
